alert.note: Alert for Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 2:42PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Apache County near Lukachukai through 415 PM MDT... At 342 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Round Rock, or 18 miles northeast of Chinle, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cove Chapter House and Lukachukai. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau
